## Promises

We all promise to listen to each other’s ideas with respect.

* We all promise to do our work as best as we can.
* We all promise to do our work on time.
* We all promise to ask for help if we need it.
* We all promise to ________________________________.

## Consequences
If someone on our team breaks one or more of our rules, the team may have a meeting and ask the person to follow our agreement. If the person still breaks the rules, we will ask the professor to help ﬁnd a solution.
